V.iii.8.B.1.b
.
Disfigurement Due to Benign or Malignant Neoplasms
Do not evaluate disfigurement due to benign or malignant neoplasms of the breast analogous to
38 CFR 4.118, DC 7800
unless there is actual disfigurement of the head, face, or neck.Â  DC 7800 is for evaluation of disfigurement of the head, face, or neck only.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 8, Section B - Disabilities of the Breast
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 8, Section B
